select seq_performance.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_performance(bno, img_url, title, writer, content) values(#{bno}, #{img}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update tbl_performance set img_url = #{img}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
update tbl_performance set replyCnt = replyCnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT bno, img_url AS img, title, writer, readcount AS readCount, regdate AS regDate, updatedate AS updateDate, content FROM tbl_performance ORDER BY bno DESC

bno > 0
